chapters.title: Chapter 5: Questioners
chapters.info: Aviendha, p. 112 (92)—Aiel of the Nine Valleys sept of the Taardad Aiel. She is Far Dareis Mai, a Maiden of the Spear. She is good friends with Egwene, Elayne, and Nynaeve, whom she met when Nynaeve saved her spear-sister during their search for He Who Comes With the Dawn. She is also friends with Rand, although since he is a man she believes him to be as bad as all the rest of them. Editor's Note: In The Dragon Reborn, Aviendha was said to be of the Bitter Water sept of the Taardad Aiel—it is unknown whether she changed septs or Robert Jordan just decided he could overlook the fact that he had already assigned her to a sept, but I think that the Nine Valleys sept sounds much nicer than the Bitter Water sept….
